name: @af/sweph
description: Swiss Ephemeris library for Vedic astrology calculations with pre-built native binaries

scripts.build:esm: tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const distDir = 'dist'; const esmDir = 'dist-esm'; if (fs.existsSync(esmDir)) { const files = fs.readdirSync(esmDir).filter(f => f.endsWith('.js')); files.forEach(file => { const src = path.join(esmDir, file); const dest = path.join(distDir, file.replace('.js', '.mjs')); if (!fs.existsSync(distDir)) fs.mkdirSync(distDir, {recursive: true}); fs.renameSync(src, dest); }); fs.rmSync(esmDir, {recursive: true, force: true}); }"
scripts.prebuild: echo 'This is a JavaScript wrapper around swisseph-v2 - no native compilation needed'
scripts.validate-dist: node -e "require('./dist/index.js'); console.log('âœ… Dist files are valid');"
